page.title: 10A LIFE IN THE DAY OF ANNA
page.content: {DAUGHTER'S DAY } IN THE MORNING I WAKE UP AT 7:00 A.M. WHEN MY ALARM CLOCK PIPS IT'S NOISE.I USUALLY JUMP OUT OF BED:PANTS ON,VEST ON,SOCKS ON,DRESS AND JUMPER.MY MOTHER SAYS I MUST BE IN THE KITCHEN BY 7:15. FOR BREAKFAST IT'S MOSTLY FARMHOUSE BRAN WITH MILK.I EAT IT QUICKLY.THEN THERE'S TOAST WITH MELTED BUTTER DRIBBLING DOWN THE SIDE.IT'S 7:55-NOW I MUST HURRY:CLEAN MY TEETH,BRUSH HAIR INTO MY BLAZER.I PICK UP MY BAG AND RUSH TO THE CAR.WE DRIVE TO SCHOOL PICKING UP ANOTHER CHILD ON THE WAY.AT SCHOOL I FALL ONTO THE QUAD,SAY GOOD-BYE TO MY MOTHER,RUSH TO HANG UP MY BLAZER AND ON TO JOIN THE ASSEMBLY QUEUE.AFTER ASSEMBLY WE'RE OFF TO OUR FIRST LESSON. IF IT'S SATURDAY IT'S MATHS-SO BORING THAT I'M PLEASED WHEN IT'S OVER. SCRIPTURE FOLLOWS AND I'M INTERESTED
